hi All

I am Harish , just now i joined this group. I have to
use junit for
testing java product. I try to installed but still it
isnot working.
would anyone help me for installation.

Thanking you in advance

Waitnig for Reply

Hello Harish,

After Downloading  the junit from junit.org, unzip
junit.jar and add it to your class path.

Run the sample tests to ensure junit is installed
correctly.

For futher details regarding installation see junit
faqs

With regards
Vara Prasad
